author: Vidyagamesnake

text: Ryoshima Coast from Okami is probably my favorite track in the game so I was pleasantly surprised to hear Okamiden's version having a lot of similar elements. This kind of sound quality coming for the DS blew me away, especially because I had played Spirit Tracks right before which had a very thin and MIDI-like sound . Looks like Capcom had much better synthesizer programmers than Nintendo for the DS.
author: SupraDarky
